views.markdown: Text-Based is a simple yet useful theme for people who don't like labels or want labels in the icon itself. Hope you enjoy!

Version 1.5.5: Added support for Movie Box on more repos than the default one and added support for iPASTORE! Thank you very much for using Text-Based! Version 1.5.4: Added support for 6 more apps! (Viber, Activity, Watch, Firefox Focus, Steam, and Xbox)

If you have any requests or problems with the theme, please tweet me on Twitter @ethanmalinow

Thank you very much for using Text-Based


Version 1.5.2: Added Home, Stocks, iBooks, and News app icon support!

If you have any problems or would like to request an icon, tweet me on Twitter (@ethanmalinow)

Thank you very much for using Text-Based!


Version 1.5: My biggest update to Text-Based yet!
-Added 15 icons by request from Nebula Mods
-Added support for the Telegram app by request on Twitter
-Fixed a problem where some apps would not show up at all

Request more icons or if you are having any problems with Text-Based, contact me on Twitter (@ethanmalinow)

Thank you very much for using Text-Based!
Version 1.4.1: Fixed a error where the Wallet (Passbook) app would not theme!

In the next update (1.5), I will be adding 19 more icons that have been requested! Expect that update to roll out in the next coming days!

Thanks so much for using Text-Based!


Version 1.4: Added support for 12 more apps!

I have gotten requests for 19 more icons and will be adding those very soon!

Hope you enjoy!
Version 1.3.3: Modified Notes icon so glyph and text are both the same color!


Version 1.3.2: Added support for the Electra icon!

If you have any problems or want to request an app icon, tweet me! @ethanmalinow Version 1.3: Added Clock app icon support! (If you have any requests for icons or any problems with the theme please contact me on twitter @ethanmalinow) Version 1.2.5: Added Game Center and modified the Cydia icon! (If you have any problems or want to request icons, contact me on twitter @ethanmalinow


Version 1.2: 22 more icons supported! 65 total icons supported!


Version 1.1.2: Fixes an issue where the Compass icon would be used for the Calculator, as well as the Compass icon Version 1.1.1: Added 7 more icons!

Version 1.1: Added 11 more icons and modified Snapchat icon!
